channel.title: - How Do i change the PvP Hot-Spots on a PvP Source? -
channel.description: The title basically says it all, i'm coding a Crazy PvP server and i don't really like the Seer's bank home, and i kinda wana change it. I've searched client.java for stuff that might resemble somthing to changing the hot spots.. but i've never really messed around with PvP sources like this before.. its a 317 incase you didn't realise.. so if you can help i would apreciate it.

item.title: - How Do i change the PvP Hot-Spots on a PvP Source? -
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It actually should be in boolean isInWilderness. If not, check your death methods and see what conditions are required for death to occur as it does. Such as if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 0) || isInPvP()) {

I’ve never heard of that source, but that’s the only help I can offer.

Read full topic

@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

I would be guessing it’s the same thing as if there was no “Hot Spot” Picture when you go into the wild. Just change the Public Boolean non-wild codes.
